alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:17AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN WICHITA... SOUTHEASTERN WALLACE AND WESTERN LOGAN COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT MDT/100 AM CDT/... At 1116 PM MDT/1216 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Wallace, or 13 miles southeast of Sharon Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Wichita, southeastern Wallace and western Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
